Query:
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE ODOO.SALES (
	ID NUMBER(38,0) COMMENT 'dwh id for sale',
    POS_ORDER_LINE_ID NUMBER(10,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'id for the single product sold at any shop at any time from pos_order_line.id',
	PRODUCT_ID NUMBER(38,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'product_template.id',
	PRODUCT_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'product_template.name',
	PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID NUMBER(10,0) COMMENT 'product_category.id with foreign key to product_template.categ_id',
	PRODUCT_CATEGORY VARCHAR(100) COMMENT 'product_category.name',
	PRODUCT_CODE VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'product_template.default_code',
	PRICE FLOAT COMMENT 'price from general (product_template.listprice) or country specific price list (product_pricelist_item.fixed_price)',
    PRICE_LIST_ID NUMBER(38, 0) COMMENT 'product.pricelist_item.pricelist_id or 1 (default public price list)', 
	PRICE_LIST VARCHAR(100) COMMENT 'price list use to get the price. Could be the default price list which matches product_template.list_price or country specific price (product_pricelist.name)',
	QUANTITY FLOAT NOT NULL COMMENT 'Pos_Order_line.qty',
	MARGIN NUMBER(38,0) COMMENT 'calculated difference between average sale price - average purchase price',
	COMPANY_ID NUMBER(38,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'pos_order_line.company_id',
	COUNTRY VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'res_company.name given pos_order_line.company_id',
	DUKA_NAME VARCHAR(100) COMMENT 'res_shop.name given pos_order.id',
	SHOP_KEEPER VARCHAR(50) COMMENT 'name of shopowner gotten from res_users.login given pos_order_line.user_id',
    CUSTOMER_ID NUMBER(38,0) COMMENT 'ID of the customer purchasing the product',
	CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) NOT NULL COMMENT 'pos_order_line.create_date',
	CREATED_BY VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'name of user who inputted the sale, gotten from res_users.login given the pos_order_line.create_uid',
	DB_CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT 'date and time sales data is inputted into the dwh',
	DB_UPDATED_AT TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT 'date and time sales data is updated into the dwh',
	SOURCE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Odoo'
);

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE ODOO.CUSTOMERS (
 ID integer comment 'dwh id for customer',
 user_id number (5) not null comment 'res_partners.id',
 phone_number varchar(50) comment 'res_partners.phone_sanitized',
 name varchar(100) not null comment 'res_partners.name',
 company_id number(4)  comment 'res_partners.company_id or fill from res_partners.country_id',
 country varchar(100) comment 'res_company.name',
 created_at datetime not null comment 'res_partners.create_date',
 created_by varchar(50) not null comment 'name of admin who created user res_users.login',
 db_created_at  TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) DEFAULT current_timestamp() comment 'date and time sales data is inputted into the dwh',
 db_updated_at TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) DEFAULT current_timestamp() comment 'date and time sales data is updated into the dwh',
 source varchar(10) not null default 'Odoo'
);

create or replace TABLE ODOO.INVENTORY (
	ID NUMBER(38,0) COMMENT 'dwh id for inventory record',
    STOCK_QUANT_ID NUMBER(8,0)  NOT NULL COMMENT 'stock_quant.id',
	LOCATION_ID NUMBER(8,0) COMMENT 'stock_quant.location_id',
	LOCATION_NAME VARCHAR(100)  COMMENT 'stock_location.name given stock_quant.location_id',
	PRODUCT_ID NUMBER(8,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'stock_quant.product_id',
	PRODUCT_NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'product_template.name given stock_quant.product_id',
	QUANTITY NUMBER(8,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'stock_quant.quantity',
	AVAILABLE_QUANTITY NUMBER(8,0) COMMENT 'quantity available in odoo',
	VALUE NUMBER(20,0),
	COMPANY_ID NUMBER(4,0) NOT NULL COMMENT 'stock_quant.company_id',
	COUNTRY VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'res_company.name',
	CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9) NOT NULL COMMENT 'res_partners.create_date',
	CREATED_BY VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'name of admin who created user res_users.login',
	DB_CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9)  DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT 'date and time sales data is inputted into the dwh',
	DB_UPDATED_AT TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9)  DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT 'date and time sales data is updated into the dwh',
	SOURCE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Odoo'
);

create or replace Table KOBO.KENYA_FARMERS_ENROLLMENT_LR23(
ID NUMBER(38,0) NOT NULL,
SUBMISSION_ID VARCHAR COMMENT 'ID of a single submission made by an individual',
REGION VARCHAR,
NURSERY VARCHAR,
DUKA VARCHAR,
USERNAME VARCHAR,
SITE VARCHAR,
OTHER_SITE VARCHAR,
FARMER_NAME VARCHAR,
FARMER_ID VARCHAR,
FARMER_PHONE_NUMBER VARCHAR,
TUPANDE_FARMER VARCHAR COMMENT 'Is user a tupande farmer or not',
COUNTRY VARCHAR DEFAULT 'KENYA',
SEASON VARCHAR,
YEAR VARCHAR,
START_TIME DATETIME COMMENT 'Timestamp when the form was being filled',
END_TIME DATETIME COMMENT 'Timestamp when the form filling was finished',
SUBMISSION_TIME DATETIME COMMENT 'Timestamp when data was submitted to kobo toolbox, could be different from end_time due to offline capabalities',
SUBMITTED_BY VARCHAR,
DB_CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9)  DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT 'date and time sales data is inputted into the dwh',
DB_UPDATED_AT TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9)  DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT 'date and time sales data is updated into the dwh',
IS_DELETED BOOLEAN default false,
SOURCE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Kobo'
);
